rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
You know, it's not every day we're authorized
to let a civilian tour the administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0002_m
rows.name: Yeah, Nagi must really, REALLY want him to join BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0002_f
rows.name: Yeah, Nagi must really, REALLY want her to join BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0003
rows.name: The AD is a bit different from the other districts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's got everything a BLADE would need,
all in one place, without any extra fluff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Get...a load...of that Skell...
Even the way that they WALK is sooo coooool...[ST:page p1=180 ]Oh yeah, work it baby...
Mmm-mmm-mmm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Clarify

rows.label: xs01050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what a Skell is.

rows.label: xs01050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Geek Out

rows.label: xs01050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Gaze longingly at the Skell.

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0006
rows.name: What?! You don't remember what a Skell is?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0007
rows.name: That gorgeous exoskeleton that just went by?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Basically like the most incredible,
awesomest superweapons EVER?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Lasers! Force fields! Bipedal AND vehicular transformations![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0010
rows.name: Sorry, just...I get so excited whenever I think about it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0011_m
rows.name: Now THIS guy gets it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0011_f
rows.name: Now THIS girl gets it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Aren't they just the cooolest?!
Just...everything about them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The lasers, the force fields, the bipedal
AND vehicular transformations?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
You ever have that dream where you're inside one,
and it's just transforming over and over? And over?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Yeaaah, you know what I'm talkin' about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0016
rows.name: Actually, I uh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
I don't normally show this to people,
but I've been working on some Skell fan fiction...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0018
rows.name: Hold on, I'll just pull it up here, one sec...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0019
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh... Uh, right. ...Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Originally, Skells were developed as a defensive measure—
to counter potential alien threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0022
rows.name:
It wasn't enough to save Earth, though—
we were outnumbered and outgunned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0023
rows.name: Still...just look around you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
New LA has gone from basically nothing
to this in just two short months.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
We could never have come so far so fast
without Skell technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'd love to get you into one to see for yourself,
but it's not that simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Well yeah, duh.
For one thing, only BLADEs are allowed to pilot Skells,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0028
rows.name: and even then, you need a license.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
These aren't toys we're talking about—
they're complex machines with powerful weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0030
rows.name:
And they're a precious resource—
we only have so many of them to go around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
So yes, as you might imagine,
the certification process is a fairly rigorous one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0032
rows.name:
I'm sure you're thinking "Where do I sign up
for the test?!"—but it's not that simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
They choose you, not the other way around.
You can't just walk in the front door and volunteer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0034
rows.name: There is some criteria...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0035
rows.name:
The details are largely hidden, but basically,
HQ only allows the cream of the crop to take the test—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0036
rows.name:
BLADEs who go above and beyond in their duties,
and for the people of New LA in general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0037
rows.name: So whattaya say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0038
rows.name:
If you become a BLADE and work hard, I'm sure it'll only be
a matter of time before they tap you on the shoulder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0039
rows.name: Speaking of work, that reminds me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Why don't we check out the Mission Control board first?
That's where we take on our assignments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01050100_MSG0041
rows.name: Good call. Let's head on over.[ST:wait ]
